pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FinmetryThis is the project on stock market data analysis using modern data anlysis tools, AI and ML.In depth tests on various stock market tools are conducted.## The current version is 0.1.3 # Importing and initiating```pythonimport finmetry as fms1 = fm.yf_base(symbol='RELIANCE')```You can now get the data out of it.------
